item.title: Experienced YouTube Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Style: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s-uP35zXVvo

We are seeking an experienced YouTube video editor to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their editing skills and a deep understanding of the YouTube platform. Responsibilities include editing and enhancing raw footage, adding effects, transitions, and graphics, and ensuring high-quality output. The editor must be proficient in using video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or / and After Effects and have a good eye for storytelling and pacing. Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are essential. If you have a passion for creating engaging video content, we want to hear from you.

Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects)
- Attention to detail
- Ability to meet deadlines
- Strong storytelling and pacing skills

This is a medium-sized project that will last for 1 to 3 months.
Budget: around 60 dollars per video, depending on skill

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 18, 2024 13:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Hiring A YouTube Voice-Over ($80+ Per Month) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are hiring a Voice Over for our YouTube Channel. This job will require you to do the following:

Create An Engaging Voice Over For Our Videos

Create 2 Voice Overs Per Week

Be Able To Match The Pace & Tone As The Examples Below

Please check out some of the videos on these channels to verify you can match the quality of Voice Over we are looking for before applying for this job.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2T-1x3F6buE&t=29s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ArrOpOpd-qs&t=49s

We are paying $10+ per video for this job, so we are looking for a well-seasoned Voice Over who has experience with making these styles of voice-over. We are looking to hire someone who can make consistent voice overs per month for our channel. if you have read through this entire job post please begin your cover letter with the word "Blue". All other applicants will be excluded. No AI as this channel needs a personal touch to the narration as it is comedy and dark humour. Scripts are typically 3500 - 4000 words.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 18, 2024 13:13 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:US English Dialect, Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Male
Skills: US English Dialect, Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Male
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Professional Video Editor (LOS) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor!
Job details:
Niche: BASKETBALL
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 8-15 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.
We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the BASKETBALL niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): CRAZY BAKSETBALL STORIES/FACTS
Would be great if you can make a 1 minute sample!
The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks
Here is an example of the type of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/yKTND_ikxlc?si=FSXJnzK5dVDKgorp
Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be a resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)
Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].
Start your bid with [Insert Random Word; Example: "Banana Milkshake"], so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.
Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 18, 2024 13:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor for High-Quality Inspirational/Educational Content - Upwork
item.description:
I’m Caden Matthews, a YouTuber focused on inspiring and educating young entrepreneurs. I am seeking a talented video editor for continuous weekly work to create high-quality, engaging videos.

Responsibilities:

- Edit weekly YouTube videos to produce professional, high-quality content
- Incorporate motion graphics, animations, and visual effects to enhance viewer engagement
- Ensure visuals and audio are synchronized and polished
- Create engaging thumbnails and end screens
- Implement feedback quickly and effectively

Requirements:

- Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio of work
- Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, etc.)
- Ability to create high-quality motion graphics and animations
- Strong sense of pacing, timing, and storytelling
- Attention to detail and a creative mindset
- Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects

Preferred Experience:

- Familiarity with content styles of creators like Iman Gadzhi and Jordan Welch
- Experience in editing educational and motivational content

Application Instructions:

Please provide a link to your portfolio and a brief overview of your relevant experience. Include your typical turnaround time for a 10-15 minute video edit.

Looking forward to finding a creative partner to elevate my content!

Best,
Caden Buiting

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 13:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 🎥 Film Your Favorite Non-Alcoholic Beverages in São Paulo! - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for participants to film a video about the selection of non-alcoholic beverages in supermarkets, hypermarkets, or wholesale stores in the city of São Paulo.
📋 Task:
Film 2 videos in the store and 4 videos at home.
Each video should be 2-3 minutes long.
No purchase is necessary.
Payment: $30.
📅 Deadline:
In-store videos must be completed by June 21st.
If you are ready to participate, please message me, and I will send you the instructions and contract.

item.title: Voice over/Video editor for tutorial videos. - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

Hope you have an amzing day!

I'm looking for a video creator.

If you meet the requirements below you might be a good fit :)

- You can do both video editing and voice over for "how to" and "review" videos. It is very bacic editing.

- You have a british or american english accent.

- You are willing to record your face and you have no problem being shown in our thumbnails with a picture of yourself.

- You have enough knowledge about computers and apps related topics.

- Experience in this field is a plus.

If you read this, please mention your favorite animal at the top of your aplication.

In the beginning the videos will be 1-5 minutes long and we pay you $5 per video.
If you do 1 video per day , that will make you at least $150 per month.
In the future we also want to add some longer indepth tutorial videos that will pay more.

This is an example channel: https://www.youtube.com/@GuideRealmVideos
The only difference is that we also record our face to get more engagement with the viewers.

Let me know if you are interested so we can discuss the details :)

If you have any experience with this kind of content please provide links.

Thanks,
Ruben

Hourly Range: $16.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 12:47 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Voice-Over, Video Editing, American English Accent, British English Accent
Skills: Voice-Over, Video Editing, American English Accent, British English Accent
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
``Duties:
- Edit video footage to create high-quality and engaging content
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry's best practices to maximize efficiency ```Requirements:```
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role - Proficient in using film editing software such as Adobe Premiere, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Creative Suite
- Familiarity with other editing software like Adobe Bridge, Capture One, and Maya is a plus
- Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques including color grading, audio mixing, and typography
- Excellent attention to detail with a creative mind and storytelling skills
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively with a team
- Strong time management skills to meet project deadlines If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to bring stories to life through visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of talented professionals and contribute to creating compelling videos that captivate audiences.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 12:44 UTC

item.title: Video Editor with Animation and Special Effects - Upwork
item.description:
We require a skilled video editor to produce instructional videos in Energy Healing. The 1st course is made up of 16 lessons.  There is a combination of stock footage and raw footage which will need to be put together.  You must have skills in adding after effects, and animation to the footage to illustrate material which is difficult to describe with words alone.
Following this first course, there will be 4 subsequent courses which will all have approx 15 videos each.  The succesful applicant will be able to demonstrate their current portfolio of work.

item.title: Adobe After Effects Specialist Who Can Create Premiere Pro Templates - Upwork
item.description:
As an After Effects Specialist, you will be responsible for creating a comprehensive library of customizable templates including transitions, overlays, text animations, popups, lower thirds, and other essential editing resources. These templates will be used by our editing team to ensure a cohesive and high-quality visual experience for every client.

Key Responsibilities:

- Design and develop a variety of After Effects templates for transitions, overlays, text animations, popups, lower thirds, and other video elements.
- Ensure all templates are customizable and user-friendly for the editing team.
- Maintain a consistent visual style across all templates to align with the company’s branding guidelines.
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and develop appropriate templates.
- Stay updated with the latest trends and techniques in motion graphics and video editing.
- Provide technical support and guidance to the editing team on how to effectively use the templates.
- Organize and manage the template library to ensure easy access and efficient workflow.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as an After Effects specialist or similar role in a multimedia production environment.
- Strong portfolio showcasing your expertise in creating a wide range of After Effects templates.
- Proficiency in Adobe After Effects and other relevant Adobe Creative Suite software.
- Excellent understanding of motion graphics principles and animation techniques.
- Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for design and aesthetics.
- Ability to work independently as well as part of a collaborative team.
- Strong communication and time management skills.
- Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.

Hourly Range: $6.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 12:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom

item.description:
Hello! This is a small job of editing audio 2 audio files.
We got them recorded from a video with vocie over but now we need this 2 audio tracks to sound clean without extra background noises. We also need to put each of the audio tract into a loop of 3 minutes long.

item.title: Producing Online courses in Arabic - Upwork
item.description:
**** The applicant must be fluent in the Arabic language, present his presentation in Arabic, and be able to present a sample for a max 5 minutes (It shows the quality of screen capture, sound quality, and explanation method).

I'm looking for a skilled professional to help me create a comprehensive online training courses for a variety of design programs, all in the Arabic language.

Key Requirements:
- Expertise in programs
- Proficiency in video editing and animation.
- Fluency in Arabic, with the ability to adapt content for different proficiency levels.
- A strong understanding of instructional design principles.
- The applicant must submit a sample
2d (Illustrator / Photoshop / After effects / Premier ...) 3d (Maya /3dsmax/ Blender ....)
The project will involve:
- Developing courses suitable for beginners, intermediate and advanced users.
- Creating content that covers key topics like basic tools and functionalities, project workflows, and design principles.

The ideal candidate will have a solid portfolio of similar projects, showcasing their ability to create engaging and effective online training content. A thorough understanding of the Arabic language is a must.

item.title: Graphic Designer - B2B SaaS Marketing - Upwork
item.description:
✅About Us: Paystubs.com is a leading provider of payroll-as-a-service (SaaS) tailored to meet the unique needs of small businesses across the United States. We pride ourselves on being the payroll solution for non-payroll experts, emphasizing simplicity, affordability, and full compliance. Our mission is to streamline payroll processes, allowing small business owners to focus on what they do best.

✅Job Description: We are seeking a talented and creative Graphic Designer to join our marketing team. The ideal candidate will have experience producing a wide range of marketing assets, including website graphics, ad visuals, landing pages, videos, animations, email visuals, and more. Experience with B2B SaaS is highly appreciated. If you have a keen eye for design and a passion for creating visually compelling content, we want to hear from you!

✅Key Responsibilities:

- Website Graphics: Design engaging and on-brand graphics for our website, ensuring a seamless user experience and visual consistency.

- Ad Visuals: Create eye-catching ad visuals for various digital platforms, including social media, display ads, video and search engine marketing.

- Landing Pages: Design effective landing pages that drive conversions and align with our marketing campaigns.

- Email Visuals: Develop visually appealing email graphics that enhance our email marketing efforts and improve engagement rates.

- Video Editing: Edit and produce high-quality videos for marketing purposes, including promotional videos, tutorials, and social media content.

- Brand Consistency: Ensure all designs adhere to our brand guidelines and maintain a consistent look and feel across all marketing materials.

- Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing team, especially PPC and copywriter to understand project requirements, target audience, and campaign goals.

- Feedback Integration: Incorporate feedback from team members and stakeholders to refine and improve designs.

- Trend Awareness: Stay updated on the latest design trends, tools, and technologies to keep our marketing materials fresh and innovative.

✅Qualifications:

- Experience: Proven experience as a graphic designer, preferably in a B2B SaaS environment.

- Portfolio: Strong portfolio showcasing your design skills and a variety of marketing assets, including websites, ads, landing pages, emails, and videos.

- Tools: Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign), Figma, and video editing software like Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.

- Creativity: Strong creative skills with the ability to develop unique and engaging visuals.

- Marketing Mindset: The ability to understand the specific traits of our target audience, including their needs and language, and adapt your creativity accordingly. We seek someone who brings original ideas and avoids simply replicating existing work.

- Attention to Detail: Excellent attention to detail, with a focus on producing high-quality work.

- Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and stakeholders.
Time Management: Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

- Education: A Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field is preferred but not required.

If you are a creative and driven graphic designer with a passion for B2B SaaS marketing, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and a link to your portfolio.



Posted On: June 18, 2024 12:28 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Landing Page Design, Video Editing, Adobe Creative Suite
Skills: Landing Page Design, Video Editing, Adobe Creative Suite
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: After Effects editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor to combine aerial spin around drone footage together with 3d renderings from 3ds max.
You would be required to edit 3d footage, apply multiple masks and color correction so that 3d footage looks seamless with the initial drone video.
In the end, we expect 60 frames from the initial video.
More information to be shared later.
In the attachment, you can see the screenshots of the examples of the files that we will provide for you.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$25.00
